name: Doom Legend:Room Break&Escape Room
description:
Hello, my friend!

You’re welcome to “Doom Legend: Room & Doors”. 
This is the "escape the locked room," the second paragraph after the personal puzzle game.
  This is a high-quality 2D puzzle game, wherein you are in a magic world with beautiful scene, mysterious environment and plot twists around you.   

Once you enter into the game, your wit is the only weapon. If you want to find out the mysterious power hidden in the world, you have to solve the puzzles and find the truth behind the mysterious power!   

The holocaust is coming…Do you have the confidence to find the truth behind “the Doom Legend”? Are you confident of stopping all of it?   

Not convinced? Come and have a try now!
